title: Saad Al-Zahrani
text: Saad Al-Zahrani (born 1 July 1980) is a Saudi Arabian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Saudi%20Arabia%20national%20football%20team">Saudi Arabia</a> in the <a href="2004%20AFC%20Asian%20Cup">2004 AFC Asian Cup</a>.
